org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.archive

Class ZipMatcherBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.archive.ZipMatcherBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher

    public abstract class ZipMatcherBase
extends Object
implements FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher
    Represents an abstract base class for a ZIP archive FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher that can strictly check an "Extra field" 16-bit ID code.

    (Derived from /usr/src/cmd/file/file.c in OpenSolaris.)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZipMatcherBase() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract boolean doesCheckExtraFieldID()
      Derived classes must implement to get a value indicating if the ZIP "Extra field ID" should be checked to match the value returne by strictExtraFieldID().
      boolean getIsPreciseMagic()
      Get a value indicating if the magic is byte-precise.
      AnalyzerFactory isMagic(byte[] contents, InputStream in)
      Try to match the file contents with an analyzer factory.
      protected Integer strictExtraFieldID()
      Derived classes that override doesCheckExtraFieldID() to return true must override this method to return the value that must equal an "Extra field ID" in the ZIP file in order for isMagic(byte[], java.io.InputStream) to match and return a defined instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher

        description, forFactory

      • getIsPreciseMagic

        public boolean getIsPreciseMagic()
        Description copied from interface: FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher
        Get a value indicating if the magic is byte-precise.
        Specified by:
        getIsPreciseMagic in interface FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher
        Returns:
        true if precise

      • isMagic

        public AnalyzerFactory isMagic(byte[] contents,
                               InputStream in)
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher
        Try to match the file contents with an analyzer factory. If the method reads from the input stream, it must reset the stream before returning.
        Specified by:
        isMagic in interface FileAnalyzerFactory.Matcher
        Parameters:
        contents - the first few bytes of a file
        in - the input stream from which the full file can be read
        Returns:
        an analyzer factory if the contents match, or null if they don't match any factory known by this matcher
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of any read error

      • doesCheckExtraFieldID

        protected abstract boolean doesCheckExtraFieldID()
        Derived classes must implement to get a value indicating if the ZIP "Extra field ID" should be checked to match the value returne by strictExtraFieldID().
        Returns:
        true if "Extra field ID" should be checked

      • strictExtraFieldID

        protected Integer strictExtraFieldID()
        Derived classes that override doesCheckExtraFieldID() to return true must override this method to return the value that must equal an "Extra field ID" in the ZIP file in order for isMagic(byte[], java.io.InputStream) to match and return a defined instance.
        Returns:
        null
